unnormalised: Crop insurance, huh? Necessary evil, maybe? Last year's floods near Patna really hurt a lot of farmers. Heard the payouts were slow from ICICI Lombard. Hope things improve! This Onam, let's pray for a good harvest and fair prices, so everyone can enjoy a plate of biryani. Need better awareness campaigns, especially in villages 50 km from Chennai. Rs. 20000/acre ain't gonna cut it if the crop fails completely. Jai Kisan!
